                <relative-time datetime="2018-03-08T16:24:18Z" class="no-wrap">Mar 8, 2018</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>The docs should stop being a special <g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="snowflake" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2744.png">âï¸</g-emoji> and switch to the language everyone knows and uses these days, to increase accessibility.</p>
<p>That said, <a href="http://redmonk.com/sogrady/2018/03/07/language-rankings-1-18/" rel="nofollow">coffeescript is still remarkably present</a>, but I expect a lot of this is legacy.</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >

                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  xmatthias
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-02-14T14:46:11Z" class="no-wrap">Feb 14, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>While ccxt does a great job unifying most functions / settings, not everything is or can be unified.<br>
I think it would be good to provide a separate wiki/documentation page which documents exchange-specific properties.</p>
<p>The behavior is there now and all is working well - but to find it users need to search through issues (which are not easy to navigate) to find certain exchange-specifics - and o</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >

                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>

          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"

            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  ema-pe
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2019-11-01T13:12:01Z" class="no-wrap">Nov 1, 2019</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>About custom filters, the <a href="https://github.com/python-telegram-bot/python-telegram-bot/wiki/Extensions-%E2%80%93-Advanced-Filters#custom-filters">Wiki</a> says that the <code>filter</code> method accepts a <code>Message</code> instance, but in the <a href="https://github.com/python-telegram-bot/python-telegram-bot/blob/master/telegram/ext/filters.py#L114">source code it accepts</a> only an <code>Update</code> instance.</p>
<p>What is right? Should</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:516103721,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="5952e05829bc099cd0ff2c119c6792a04c22c09f92f20582b4ba46055418374b" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/python-telegram-bot/python-telegram-bot/issues/1595">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">
                <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-tag" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.5 7.775V2.75C2.5 2.6837 2.52634 2.62011 2.57322 2.57322C2.62011 2.52634 2.6837 2.5 2.75 2.5H7.775C7.80785 2.49994 7.84039 2.50636 7.87077 2.51888C7.90114 2.53141 7.92874 2.5498 7.952 2.573L14.202 8.823C14.2253 8.84622 14.2438 8.87381 14.2564 8.90418C14.269 8.93456 14.2754 8.96712 14.2754 9C14.2754 9.03288 14.269 9.06544 14.2564 9.09582C14.2438 9.12619 14.2253 9.15378 14.202 9.177L9.177 14.202C9.15378 14.2253 9.12619 14.2438 9.09582 14.2564C9.06544 14.269 9.03288 14.2754 9 14.2754C8.96712 14.2754 8.93456 14.269 8.90418 14.2564C8.87381 14.2438 8.84622 14.2253 8.823 14.202L2.573 7.952C2.5498 7.92874 2.53141 7.90114 2.51888 7.87077C2.50636 7.84039 2.49994 7.80785 2.5 7.775ZM1 7.775V2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H7.775C8.239 1 8.685 1.184 9.013 1.513L15.263 7.763C15.5909 8.09115 15.7751 8.53609 15.7751 9C15.7751 9.46391 15.5909 9.90885 15.263 10.237L10.237 15.263C9.90885 15.5909 9.46391 15.7751 9 15.7751C8.53609 15.7751 8.09115 15.5909 7.763 15.263L1.513 9.013C1.35035 8.85047 1.22133 8.65747 1.1333 8.44505C1.04528 8.23263 0.999983 8.00494 1 7.775ZM6 5C5.73478 5 5.48043 5.10536 5.29289 5.29289C5.10536 5.48043 5 5.73478 5 6C5 6.26522 5.10536 6.51957 5.29289 6.70711C5.48043 6.89464 5.73478 7 6 7C6.26522 7 6.51957 6.89464 6.70711 6.70711C6.89464 6.51957 7 6.26522 7 6C7 5.73478 6.89464 5.48043 6.70711 5.29289C6.51957 5.10536 6.26522 5 6 5Z"></path></svg>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/gunthercox/ChatterBot/issues/1619" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:409456402,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="75ce49d706fa7d277dc361f4d73004f1733cc0e0721dbc776093013f03ff1949" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                [Django] Using other database than the &quot;default&quot;
</a>

            </h1>

            <div class="f6 text-gray text-right no-wrap mt-1 ml-3">
              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

              1
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="bkawakami"
              src="https://avatars0.githubusercontent.com/u/1881935?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  bkawakami
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2019-02-12T19:12:23Z" class="no-wrap">Feb 12, 2019</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>I am trying to integrate ChatterBot into my Django application, but I would like ChatterBot to work in a database other than the default.</p>
<p>Django itself gives you the option of model routing when you want to use multiple databases:</p>
<p><a href="https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/2.1/topics/db/multi-db/" rel="nofollow">https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/2.1/topics/db/multi-db/</a></p>
<p>But even following the Django standard, ChatterBot insists on running only on the default database.</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:409456402,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="935347a06dfd19a1cfcb6834513be542ae5e36794f54dddc558cc653277970ab" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/gunthercox/ChatterBot/issues/1619">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">
                <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-tag" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.5 7.775V2.75C2.5 2.6837 2.52634 2.62011 2.57322 2.57322C2.62011 2.52634 2.6837 2.5 2.75 2.5H7.775C7.80785 2.49994 7.84039 2.50636 7.87077 2.51888C7.90114 2.53141 7.92874 2.5498 7.952 2.573L14.202 8.823C14.2253 8.84622 14.2438 8.87381 14.2564 8.90418C14.269 8.93456 14.2754 8.96712 14.2754 9C14.2754 9.03288 14.269 9.06544 14.2564 9.09582C14.2438 9.12619 14.2253 9.15378 14.202 9.177L9.177 14.202C9.15378 14.2253 9.12619 14.2438 9.09582 14.2564C9.06544 14.269 9.03288 14.2754 9 14.2754C8.96712 14.2754 8.93456 14.269 8.90418 14.2564C8.87381 14.2438 8.84622 14.2253 8.823 14.202L2.573 7.952C2.5498 7.92874 2.53141 7.90114 2.51888 7.87077C2.50636 7.84039 2.49994 7.80785 2.5 7.775ZM1 7.775V2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H7.775C8.239 1 8.685 1.184 9.013 1.513L15.263 7.763C15.5909 8.09115 15.7751 8.53609 15.7751 9C15.7751 9.46391 15.5909 9.90885 15.263 10.237L10.237 15.263C9.90885 15.5909 9.46391 15.7751 9 15.7751C8.53609 15.7751 8.09115 15.5909 7.763 15.263L1.513 9.013C1.35035 8.85047 1.22133 8.65747 1.1333 8.44505C1.04528 8.23263 0.999983 8.00494 1 7.775ZM6 5C5.73478 5 5.48043 5.10536 5.29289 5.29289C5.10536 5.48043 5 5.73478 5 6C5 6.26522 5.10536 6.51957 5.29289 6.70711C5.48043 6.89464 5.73478 7 6 7C6.26522 7 6.51957 6.89464 6.70711 6.70711C6.89464 6.51957 7 6.26522 7 6C7 5.73478 6.89464 5.48043 6.70711 5.29289C6.51957 5.10536 6.26522 5 6 5Z"></path></svg>

              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-01-03T01:36:26Z" class="no-wrap">Jan 2, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>Docs &amp; samples should be updated to notify developers of Facebook's echo and delivery confirmations. If the <code>message_deliveries</code> and <code>message_echoes</code> webhook events are subscribed to and are not filtered for in the bot's incoming messages, then the user will receive continuous echoes / responses. This is something that does not occur via the Azure Bot Service Facebook channel as that service filte</p>

                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"

                  <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/howdyai/botkit/issues/682" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;LITTLE_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:210742261,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="a31eff2d83c02192e1be582654218a3d6e88a8e74eb45f821a142da2e49e1f31" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:small;">
                    Storage documentation is incorrect

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>My feature request is to include an option on a button made from choice skill, to redirect a link to an external url...</p>
<p>Here's a detailed explanation including screenshots</p>
<p><a href="https://help.botpress.io/t/how-to-redirect-to-an-external-url-while-using-a-button-made-in-choice-skill/1791" rel="nofollow">https://help.botpress.io/t/how-to-redirect-to-an-external-url-while-using-a-button-made-in-choice-skill/1791</a></p>
<p>This option will be really beneficial  using choice skill buttons since at the moment, you can only add an ext</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>I propose this topic as feature request, but it's also a documentation issue, as lack of details in user guide paragraph: <a href="https://rasa.com/docs/rasa/core/actions/#custom-actions" rel="nofollow">https://rasa.com/docs/rasa/core/actions/#custom-actions</a>.</p>
<p>What specified in paragraph <a href="https://rasa.com/docs/rasa/core/actions/#id8" rel="nofollow">Execute Actions in Other Code</a> is obscure to me, and details at the API documentation link [Action Server](]<a href="https://rasa.com/docs/rasa/api/acti" rel="nofollow">https://rasa.com/docs/rasa/api/acti</a></p>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/microsoft/botframework-sdk/issues/5500" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:483636782,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="992337f8efd1ac0f9f6e78a04a18e2a38be403e1540f44cf23ab74ec7302d009" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                15s Timeouts and Long Running Operations Guidence
</a>

            </h1>

            <div class="f6 text-gray text-right no-wrap mt-1 ml-3">
              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

              3
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="cleemullins"
              src="https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/1165321?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  cleemullins
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2019-08-21T20:30:56Z" class="no-wrap">Aug 21, 2019</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>On a weekly basis, customer report issues around the 15 second timeout. This problem manifests as Exceptions and looks like a timeout.</p>
<p>We need to offer a more robust guidenance around Async / Long-Running operations. This guidenance likley takes the form of:</p>
<ol>
<li>Your bot responds very quickly.</li>
<li>Do Needed Processing()</li>
<li>Send the result to the user as a Async / Proactive message.</li>
</ol>
<p>There</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:483636782,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="ed71e7ec9298b37c3ec73125e903851dd17cb49a2fd44cb345eff3cd9b4d8e83" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/microsoft/botframework-sdk/issues/5500">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">
                <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-tag" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.5 7.775V2.75C2.5 2.6837 2.52634 2.62011 2.57322 2.57322C2.62011 2.52634 2.6837 2.5 2.75 2.5H7.775C7.80785 2.49994 7.84039 2.50636 7.87077 2.51888C7.90114 2.53141 7.92874 2.5498 7.952 2.573L14.202 8.823C14.2253 8.84622 14.2438 8.87381 14.2564 8.90418C14.269 8.93456 14.2754 8.96712 14.2754 9C14.2754 9.03288 14.269 9.06544 14.2564 9.09582C14.2438 9.12619 14.2253 9.15378 14.202 9.177L9.177 14.202C9.15378 14.2253 9.12619 14.2438 9.09582 14.2564C9.06544 14.269 9.03288 14.2754 9 14.2754C8.96712 14.2754 8.93456 14.269 8.90418 14.2564C8.87381 14.2438 8.84622 14.2253 8.823 14.202L2.573 7.952C2.5498 7.92874 2.53141 7.90114 2.51888 7.87077C2.50636 7.84039 2.49994 7.80785 2.5 7.775ZM1 7.775V2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H7.775C8.239 1 8.685 1.184 9.013 1.513L15.263 7.763C15.5909 8.09115 15.7751 8.53609 15.7751 9C15.7751 9.46391 15.5909 9.90885 15.263 10.237L10.237 15.263C9.90885 15.5909 9.46391 15.7751 9 15.7751C8.53609 15.7751 8.09115 15.5909 7.763 15.263L1.513 9.013C1.35035 8.85047 1.22133 8.65747 1.1333 8.44505C1.04528 8.23263 0.999983 8.00494 1 7.775ZM6 5C5.73478 5 5.48043 5.10536 5.29289 5.29289C5.10536 5.48043 5 5.73478 5 6C5 6.26522 5.10536 6.51957 5.29289 6.70711C5.48043 6.89464 5.73478 7 6 7C6.26522 7 6.51957 6.89464 6.70711 6.70711C6.89464 6.51957 7 6.26522 7 6C7 5.73478 6.89464 5.48043 6.70711 5.29289C6.51957 5.10536 6.26522 5 6 5Z"></path></svg>

              <div class="labels lh-condensed">

              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/discordjs/discord.js/issues/4061" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:597131149,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="61f9a9fafd357ab9a906e1c5b5d87ab93e23e6c7a0207fd1f3621a58f828b89d" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Add function to get vanity URL uses

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="Lilli-Samson"
              src="https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/60050034?v=4"

          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  Lilli-Samson
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-04-09T08:57:45Z" class="no-wrap">Apr 9, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p><strong>Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.</strong><br>
I want to get the uses of a vanity URL, but there is no function for that.</p>
<p><strong>Describe the ideal solution</strong><br>
Add a function <code>Guild.fetchVanityUses()</code> that gets the uses of a vanity URL, if any.</p>
<p><strong>Describe alternatives you've considered</strong><br>
It is already possible to get vanity invites via `client.fetchInvite(server.vanityURLCod</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >

                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>It's not clear from the current docs whether you buy or sell stock for a company that Trump complains about.</p>
<p>You should state your bias about your expectation about Trump's tweets effect on stock prices. (Note that Nordstorm stock went up after Trump complained about them).</p>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/botman/botman/issues/1066" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:495346106,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="29206068a96f3985bde14f59a31c3123313ca35ca79da74f3f7e2d018bc08ee6" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Conversation callbacks return value
</a>

            </h1>
          </div>

        </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="sasha-x"
              src="https://avatars3.githubusercontent.com/u/8925015?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  sasha-x
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2019-09-18T16:59:38Z" class="no-wrap">Sep 18, 2019</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>In <a href="https://github.com/botman/docs/blob/master/conversations.md">https://github.com/botman/docs/blob/master/conversations.md</a> all callbacks have no <code>return</code> statement (i.e. <code>return null</code>).<br>
But  in <a href="https://github.com/botman/botman/blob/75a2ed17b87f9ec286345972f8465342922ef074/src/BotMan.php#L491">https://github.com/botman/botman/blob/75a2ed17b87f9ec286345972f8465342922ef074/src/BotMan.php#L491</a> we assume call was successfull if user function <code>return true</code> (and stop futher processing). Otherwise we go on matches process. It may lead to multi-match into one re</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:495346106,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="2a8fa47aef2264ced455a102c2e71c03540191adc514b0c671171de8696cfc96" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/botman/botman/issues/1066">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">
                <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-tag" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.5 7.775V2.75C2.5 2.6837 2.52634 2.62011 2.57322 2.57322C2.62011 2.52634 2.6837 2.5 2.75 2.5H7.775C7.80785 2.49994 7.84039 2.50636 7.87077 2.51888C7.90114 2.53141 7.92874 2.5498 7.952 2.573L14.202 8.823C14.2253 8.84622 14.2438 8.87381 14.2564 8.90418C14.269 8.93456 14.2754 8.96712 14.2754 9C14.2754 9.03288 14.269 9.06544 14.2564 9.09582C14.2438 9.12619 14.2253 9.15378 14.202 9.177L9.177 14.202C9.15378 14.2253 9.12619 14.2438 9.09582 14.2564C9.06544 14.269 9.03288 14.2754 9 14.2754C8.96712 14.2754 8.93456 14.269 8.90418 14.2564C8.87381 14.2438 8.84622 14.2253 8.823 14.202L2.573 7.952C2.5498 7.92874 2.53141 7.90114 2.51888 7.87077C2.50636 7.84039 2.49994 7.80785 2.5 7.775ZM1 7.775V2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H7.775C8.239 1 8.685 1.184 9.013 1.513L15.263 7.763C15.5909 8.09115 15.7751 8.53609 15.7751 9C15.7751 9.46391 15.5909 9.90885 15.263 10.237L10.237 15.263C9.90885 15.5909 9.46391 15.7751 9 15.7751C8.53609 15.7751 8.09115 15.5909 7.763 15.263L1.513 9.013C1.35035 8.85047 1.22133 8.65747 1.1333 8.44505C1.04528 8.23263 0.999983 8.00494 1 7.775ZM6 5C5.73478 5 5.48043 5.10536 5.29289 5.29289C5.10536 5.48043 5 5.73478 5 6C5 6.26522 5.10536 6.51957 5.29289 6.70711C5.48043 6.89464 5.73478 7 6 7C6.26522 7 6.51957 6.89464 6.70711 6.70711C6.89464 6.51957 7 6.26522 7 6C7 5.73478 6.89464 5.48043 6.70711 5.29289C6.51957 5.10536 6.26522 5 6 5Z"></path></svg>

        <div class="px-3 pb-3">
            <article class="d-flex flex-justify-between mb-2">

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/yagop/node-telegram-bot-api/issues/711" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:427209652,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="cba2add1a45c119237d67fec6023185d85b17ab3264cc876af9f963a47e9e85c" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                &#39;reply_to_message&#39; section missing from a reply-to message?

          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"

            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  elboertjie
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2019-03-29T23:10:22Z" class="no-wrap">Mar 29, 2019</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>What prevents a bot from receiving the 'reply_to_message' section in a message?</p>
<p>My bot uses the username of the user from the original message that was responded to, but this section from the message is missing for this in some telegram groups.</p>
<p>user1: hi<br>
user2: (reply to user1's message) /welcome Have a look here:  xxx</p>
<p>nodejs console.log(msg):</p>
<p>Message structure in a working group:</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:427209652,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="be0041d701d18e12b4e9eab3423f11f9a1047df85524c35540927c7405410d8a" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/yagop/node-telegram-bot-api/issues/711">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto h5 lh-condensed">

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/axa-group/nlp.js/issues/384" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:561033379,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="29f405cbc19d212513636abd740dae7efc87590aae4d4783e61ba1f51c12f2d4" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Document initialization settings
</a>

            </h1>
          </div>

        </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="etiennellipse"
              src="https://avatars3.githubusercontent.com/u/13202064?v=4"
              width="32"

          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  etiennellipse
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-02-06T14:04:08Z" class="no-wrap">Feb 6, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>When trying to find the options that can be used to initialize NLP.js, I have to delve into the code and navigate through many files to find what I am looking for, if I am lucky. Also the structure of the settings are hard to figure out and require a lot of trial and error.</p>
<p>For example, we are using the NlpManager with these:</p>
<pre><code>{
    ner: { builtins: [] },
    autoSave: false,
    langua
</code></pre>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:561033379,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="7e1976586e8f183204a51120ffb543e5213f563b2af752fd3d81bebd3e8ead3e" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/axa-group/nlp.js/issues/384">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>Hi, I just looking for a development guide for TypeScript.</p>
<p>Or maybe just an interface <code>LineClient</code> or <code>LineAction</code> got export is enough for me.</p>
<p>The reason is bottender now got have interfaces of Action, Client, Event and Props etc. It's wonderful.</p>
<p>With these interfaces, I can say <code>const SayHi: Action&lt;Client, Event&gt;</code>, which with argument interfaces <code>context.sendText</code> and <code>props?.next</code> and</p>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/snipsco/snips-nlu/issues/793" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:439314920,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="d4c9e0743809e8a415688689a3c86bafb0c47720a1bcdfb65e93fc65533d3c08" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                trailing curly brace being stripped from slot value
</a>

            </h1>
          </div>

            <div class="f6 text-gray text-right no-wrap mt-1 ml-3">
              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

              3
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="Shotgun167"
              src="https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/23389699?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  Shotgun167
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2019-05-01T20:38:32Z" class="no-wrap">May 1, 2019</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>I have some values in slots that are surrounded by curly braces and are meant to be returned as is. Instead, the trailing brace is being stripped. "${website}" becomes "${website". I have training examples where the whole "${website}" is included. Is there a way to change this behavior?</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:439314920,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="cb7aef0a8df4a64d6ffc7cea25a7024ded1b641d1123f46357e9c913f3722f8e" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/snipsco/snips-nlu/issues/793">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">

                  <h2>Context</h2>
<ul>
<li>Telegraf.js Version: 3.37</li>
<li>Node.js Version: 13.13</li>
<li>Operating System: Ubuntu 19.10</li>
</ul>
<h2>Expected Behavior</h2>
<p>In the Telegraf documentation in <a href="https://telegraf.js.org/#/?id=sendaudio" rel="nofollow">Doc</a> says that the extra parameter can be whatever that official telegram doc has said! So I can be able to send something to bot:</p>
<pre><code>ctx.replyWithAudio(downloadLink, {
        title: mytitle,
</code></pre>

                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"

                  <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/telegraf/telegraf/issues/969" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;LITTLE_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:595647098,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="299154b35466f52d6562f36f4362e8b0eadfbcacf47e38b2c1f3e4aa9bd78c32" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:small;">
                    Instructions for deploying to Now.sh?
</a>

                </h1>
              </div>

            </article>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/botui/botui/issues/78" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:354263571,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="4008eae116788b3859e94ab704e99b73d032efab7bb70a215e7061bc82a68508" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Markdown image is deleted by the next message

            <div class="f6 text-gray text-right no-wrap mt-1 ml-3">
              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="Fab1en"
              src="https://avatars3.githubusercontent.com/u/1143066?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  Fab1en
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2018-08-27T10:23:17Z" class="no-wrap">Aug 27, 2018</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>I cannot reproduce this with the default usage of botui : the issue appears only when botui is part of a larger VueJS app.</p>
<p>When a markdown image is inserted in a message, it is immediately hidden if another message is displayed after.</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-js"><pre><span class="pl-s1">botui</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-c1">message</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">add</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">{</span>
	<span class="pl-c1">content</span>: <span class="pl-s">'Hello World'</span>
<span class="pl-kos">}</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>
<span class="pl-s1">botui</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-c1">message</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-c1">add</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">{</span>
	<span class="pl-c1">content</span>: 'Here is a picture : ![](https://www.google.fr/images/branding/g</pre></div>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/slackapi/hubot-slack/issues/536" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:366930190,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="93a9102bfdae49dec64431796f24829eb27719b87e84bdbd3a23be972c3f593d" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="mistydemeo"
              src="https://avatars0.githubusercontent.com/u/780485?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  mistydemeo
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2018-10-04T19:10:55Z" class="no-wrap">Oct 4, 2018</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <h3>Description</h3>
<p>While hubot-slack has support for reconnecting when the connection to Slack is lost, there is a limit to the number of reconnection attempts. If several reconnection attempts fail, the bot will simply hang without a connection. This causes trouble for our process manager, since the client staying open means we don't end up automatically restart it. When this has happened for us</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:366930190,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="c315a84ef75b7d84fcbac4cac07df1458656d0bffb412d50e58fd0b0ed8b16be" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/slackapi/hubot-slack/issues/536">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">
                <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-tag" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.5 7.775V2.75C2.5 2.6837 2.52634 2.62011 2.57322 2.57322C2.62011 2.52634 2.6837 2.5 2.75 2.5H7.775C7.80785 2.49994 7.84039 2.50636 7.87077 2.51888C7.90114 2.53141 7.92874 2.5498 7.952 2.573L14.202 8.823C14.2253 8.84622 14.2438 8.87381 14.2564 8.90418C14.269 8.93456 14.2754 8.96712 14.2754 9C14.2754 9.03288 14.269 9.06544 14.2564 9.09582C14.2438 9.12619 14.2253 9.15378 14.202 9.177L9.177 14.202C9.15378 14.2253 9.12619 14.2438 9.09582 14.2564C9.06544 14.269 9.03288 14.2754 9 14.2754C8.96712 14.2754 8.93456 14.269 8.90418 14.2564C8.87381 14.2438 8.84622 14.2253 8.823 14.202L2.573 7.952C2.5498 7.92874 2.53141 7.90114 2.51888 7.87077C2.50636 7.84039 2.49994 7.80785 2.5 7.775ZM1 7.775V2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H7.775C8.239 1 8.685 1.184 9.013 1.513L15.263 7.763C15.5909 8.09115 15.7751 8.53609 15.7751 9C15.7751 9.46391 15.5909 9.90885 15.263 10.237L10.237 15.263C9.90885 15.5909 9.46391 15.7751 9 15.7751C8.53609 15.7751 8.09115 15.5909 7.763 15.263L1.513 9.013C1.35035 8.85047 1.22133 8.65747 1.1333 8.44505C1.04528 8.23263 0.999983 8.00494 1 7.775ZM6 5C5.73478 5 5.48043 5.10536 5.29289 5.29289C5.10536 5.48043 5 5.73478 5 6C5 6.26522 5.10536 6.51957 5.29289 6.70711C5.48043 6.89464 5.73478 7 6 7C6.26522 7 6.51957 6.89464 6.70711 6.70711C6.89464 6.51957 7 6.26522 7 6C7 5.73478 6.89464 5.48043 6.70711 5.29289C6.51957 5.10536 6.26522 5 6 5Z"></path></svg>

            </article>

            <div class="mt-3">

                Find more good first issues <span class="Bump-link-symbol">â</span>

        <div class="d-flex flex-wrap border-bottom border-gray-light px-3 pt-2 pb-2">
            <a class="topic-tag topic-tag-link f6 mb-2" href="/topics/api" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;TOPIC&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;TOPIC_TAG&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:242,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/bot&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="de31ca39e651a537ecfd29b4eb50a6005608832b5e8033445485b8e0c459f9f8" data-ga-click="Explore, go to topic, location:explore feed repository" title="Topic: api">
              api
